short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Keep track of your carbon footprint while browsing the web.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
As the stewards of our planet, we have the responsibility of safeguarding our ecosystems, for the sake of all future humans and animals. Equilibrate will help you keep track of your carbon footprint while browsing the web, and give you the option to send money to charity by watching ads. Together we can bring our climate back into equilibrium!

This extension is open-source, follow it on Github: https://github.com/Luca-Pistor/Equilibrate
